verses.name: Titus 1:5
verses.text: For this cause left I thee in Crete, that thou shouldest set in order the things that are wanting, and ordain elders in every city, as I had appointed thee:

verses.name: Titus 1:6
verses.text: If any be blameless, the husband of one wife, having faithful children not accused of riot or unruly.

verses.name: Titus 1:7
verses.text: For a bishop must be blameless, as the steward of God; not selfwilled, not soon angry, not given to wine, no striker, not given to filthy lucre;

verses.name: Titus 1:8
verses.text: But a lover of hospitality, a lover of good men, sober, just, holy, temperate;
